title: 95/479/EC: Commission Decision of 7 November 1995 approving the programme on infectious haematopoietic necrosis and viral haemorrhagic septicaemia submitted by Finland (Only the Finnish text is authentic) (Text with EEA relevance)
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 7 November  1995 approving the programme on infectious haematopoietic necrosis and viral haemorrhagic  septicaemia submitted by Finland (Only the Finnish text is authentic) (Text with EEA relevance)  (95/479/EC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The programme on IHN and VHS submitted by Finland is hereby  approved.
Finland shall take all the legislative, administrative and regulatory measures  necessary to comply as of 1 January 1996 with the programme referred to in Article 1.
This Decision is addressed to the Republic of Finland.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 7 November 1995.
For the Commission Franz FISCHLER Member of the Commission
